name: ioogtlbd
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0

stmt.origin: syl3anc(w0, wbr(c0, clt, c1), wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(c1, co(c0, cioo, c2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, clt, c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cxr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cxr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, co(c0, cioo, c2)))
-| wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(c1, co(c0, cioo, c2))), wbr(c0, clt, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, clt, c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cxr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cxr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, co(c0, cioo, c2)))
-| wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(c1, co(c0, cioo, c2))), wbr(c0, clt, c1))

body.origin: |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(c1, co(c0, cioo, c2))), wbr(c0, clt, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, clt, c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cxr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cxr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, co(c0, cioo, c2)))

comment: An element of a closed interval is greater than its lower bound. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
